results.title: Advertising
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Explores the structure of an advertising agency, looking at the roles of account executives, researchers, commercial artists, copywriters, photographers, production and media planners. By following the process of an advertising campaign, the skills and collaboration required within each section of an agency are highlighted.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

By following the process of an advertising campaign, the skills and collaboration required within each section of an agency are highlighted.

results.title: Introduction to Psychology
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

group_works.title: Just an accident
group_works.creator_credit: Carol Haslam, BBC-TV and Open University

results.title: Just an accident
results.creator_credit: Carol Haslam, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Introduction to Psychology”.
Concerned with the experimental investigation of human factors in road accident causation. Considers individual differences in hazard perception, the problem of where the driver pays attention within the visual field, and how the driver deals with a hazard which has been seen.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Introduction to Psychology”.
Concerned with the experimental investigation of human factors in road accident causation. Considers individual differences in hazard perception, the problem of where the driver pays attention within the visual field, and how the driver deals with a hazard which has been seen.

group_siblings.title: What psychologists do (TEFC)
group_siblings.creator_credit: Carol Haslam and Open University

results.title: What psychologists do (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Introduction to Psychology”.
John Annett looks at work being done by six psychologists in the following areas: acquisition of reading skills, computer assisted learning, vocational guidance, design of industrial machine tools, diagnosis of brain damage, work with chronic, mute schizophrenics. He points out the close relationship between psychological research and its application to real life problems.

results.title: Tanzania: path for a nation
results.creator_credit: Ben Park, Gilbert Lauzun and United Nations Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “International zone”
President of Tanzania, Julius Nyerere, the guide in this film, explains his country’s determination to seek a single citizenship for all its people, to overcome problems of hunger, poverty and ignorance without putting the country in debt to outside exploiters, and to build new systems of cooperation at all levels.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ben Park, Gilbert Lauzun and United Nations Television

results.title: Submerged glory
results.creator_credit: Frank Jacoby, Alistair Cooke and United Nations Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “International zone”
In every continent there are milestones which mark humanity’s progress from pre-history to the age of the atom. From the temples in Cambodia to the Cathedral in Chartres, these creations stand as a common treasure. Today the temples of Nubia are threatened with inundation by the waters soon to rise at the Aswan Dam; Unesco has called for a worldwide effort to save them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Jacoby, Alistair Cooke and United Nations Television

results.title: The Sixth continent
results.creator_credit: Gilbert Lauzun, George Movshon and United Nations Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “International Zone”.
Discusses the unexploited resources of the sea bed, scientific investigations in progress, the danger of pollution and questions of ownership.

description_for_label:
Episode of Series “International Zone”.
Discusses the unexploited resources of the sea bed, scientific investigations in progress, the danger of pollution and questions of ownership.
